author: daxian-dbw
body:
Resolves the "Modules" item in #1266 

There are 4 modules that require different psd1 files for CoreCLR PS:
Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics
Microsoft.PowerShell.Management
Microsoft.PowerShell.Security
Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility

@vors could you please take a look?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: What happened to `Utility.psm1`? I don't see the new file, just the deletion.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa there was a duplicate in Shared and Core for psm1 file

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @andschwa The Utility.psm1 is shared between Full and Core, and it's already in Shared/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility

title: Update and clean up module files in Core/Full/Shared folders
